field.label: Domain
field.help: Domain of this server, e.g. example.com

field.label: API Token
field.help: Specifiy a password token used for API calls.

field.label: API External Port
field.help: Specify the port for the API to listen on from the Internet.

field.label: API Internal Port
field.help: Specify the port for the API to listen on Internally.

field.label: External MQ Bind Address
field.help: IPv4 address of the MQ Host, e.g. 0.0.0.0 or 1.2.3.4

field.label: Internal MQ Port
field.help: IPv4 Port of the HQ Host, e.g. 8883

field.label: Internal MQ Bind Address
field.help: IPv4 address of the MQ Host, e.g. 127.0.0.1 or 192.168.100.100

field.label: Internal MQ Port
field.help: IPv4 Port of the HQ Host, e.g. 8883

field.label: MQ Password
field.help: Admin Password to the MQ Host
